actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that efficient wood-burning heating systems should be made eligible for the residential energy credit.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Secretary of the Treasury should exercise his regulatory authority by designating energy efficient wood-burning stoves as eligible for the residential energy tax credit.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that efficient wood-burning heating systems should be made eligible for the residential energy credit.
